comment._content: 1912 Olympics in Sweden. See very similar picture, Plate 252 (after page 680) in THE OFFICIAL REPORT OF THE OLYMPIC GAMES OF STOCKHOLM 1912. www.la84foundation.org/6oic/OfficialReports/1912/1912.pdf
